title: General
fullText:
The system equipment should be protected against lightning surge, where necessary, in accordance with AS/NZS 1768.
The use of metal oxide varistors (MOV) is recommended and it is recommended that expert advice should be sought in lightning prone areas.
NOTES:
1	Gas discharge protection devices/surge protectors are not recommended as they may not self extinguish on a d.c. circuit.
2	For information on lightning protection, see Appendix E.
